"Combat Controls":
"Normal Attack: <%NormalAttack>
PA (Photon Art)/Technique: <%PhotonArts>
Charged PA: Press and hold <%PhotonArts>
Back palette PA: Hold <%WeaponAction_2> and press <%NormalAttack>"

"Dash Attack: <%NormalAttack> while Dashing
Step Attack: <%Avoid> then <%NormalAttack>
Dive Attack: Hold <%Jump> in mid-air and press <%NormalAttack>"
